for ne in no["ne_mainslope_#*"] do if random(2) == 1 then x = st(ne+{1,0}) y = st(ne+{0,-1}) if x:is("st_oneway") and y:is("st_oneway") then x.color = cond(x.color==BLACK,WHITE,BLACK) y.color = cond(y.color==BLACK,WHITE,BLACK) end end end
